texto: 7.2.4 Examples of applications Typical examples of applications of designed experiments include: — validating the effect of medical treatment, or assessing the relative effectiveness of several types of treatment; — verifying the characteristics of a product, service or process against some specified performance standards; — identifying the influential factors in complex processes to achieve desired outcomes, such as improvement in the mean value, or reduced variability of characteristics such as process yield, product strength, durability, noise level, etc.; — solving problems in complex processes, by helping to identify the more significant process factors in complex processes as well as
